message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DM, cs.GT, cs.MA 

This paper deals with a multi-armed bandit problem, which is a classic problem in machine learning and decision making. The paper also discusses the optimal policy and regret of the learner, which are topics commonly studied in the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The problem formulation involves Markov Decision Processes (MDP), which is a topic in the sub-category of data management (cs.DM). The paper also discusses the potential application of the problem in medical treatment assignment, which falls under the sub-categories of game theory (cs.GT) and multi-agent systems (cs.MA).
